ARABIC: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or do you ask them for a wage so they are weighed down with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do you ask for any compensation from them that they are burdened with want?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or are you asking them for some compensation so that they feel burdened with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), do you ask for your preaching any recompense which is too heavy a price for them to pay?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or is it that you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) ask any fee from them, so they are burdened with the penalty?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or is it that you ask them a wage, so that they are heavily burdened with debt
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or do you ask from them a reward, so that they are burdened with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or askest thou them for a wage, and so they are weighed down with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or dost thou (Muhammad) ask a fee from them so that they are heavily taxed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you demand some recompense from them that would weigh them down with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Askest thou a hire from them so that they are laden with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do you ask them for a reward, so that they are weighed down with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or is it that thou dost ask them for a reward, so that they are burdened with a load of debt?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or is it that you (O Muhammad SAW) ask them a wage, so that they are heavily burdened with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, do you ask them for a wage, so that they are burdened withdebt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do you ask them for a fee, so they are burdened with debt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:46] Or are you asking them a fee, in return for delivering the Message, so that they are weighed down with debt?, [so that they are weighed down] with what they will [have to] give you, and that is why they do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or dost thou (Muhammad) ask a fee) or provision in exchange for faith (from them) from the people of Mecca (so that they are heavily taxed) they are too much indebted by accepting your invitation to accept faith?
